params._epochId: Epoch id used to get the frame

params._administratorAddress: Address able to call administrative methods
params._annualAprUpperBound: Beacon bound parameter. Maximum apr allowed for balance increase. Delta between updates is extrapolated on a year time frame.
params._epochsPerFrame: Beacon spec parameter. Number of epochs in a frame.
params._genesisTime: Beacon spec parameter. Timestamp of the genesis slot.
params._relativeLowerBound: Beacon bound parameter. Maximum relative balance decrease.
params._riverContractAddress: Address of the River contract, able to receive oracle input data after quorum is met
params._secondsPerSlot: Beacon spec parameter. Number of seconds between slots.
params._slotsPerEpoch: Beacon spec parameter. Number of slots in one epoch.

isMember(address).details: Performs a naive search, do not call this on-chain, used as an off-chain helper

reportBeacon(uint256,uint64,uint32).details: Only callable by an oracle member

params._epochId: Epoch where the balance and validator count has been computed

params._annualAprUpperBound: Maximum apr allowed for balance increase. Delta between updates is extrapolated on a year time frame.

params._epochsPerFrame: Number of epochs in a frame.
params._slotsPerEpoch: Number of slots in one epoch.

addMember(address).notice: Adds new address as oracle member, giving the ability to push beacon reports.

getCurrentEpochId().notice: Retrieve the current epoch id based on block timestamp

getFrameFirstEpochId(uint256).notice: Retrieve the first epoch id of the frame of the provided epoch id

getLastCompletedEpochId().notice: Retrieve the last completed epoch id

getReportVariant(uint256).notice: Retrieve decoded report at provided index

isMember(address).notice: Returns true if address is member

removeMember(address).notice: Removes an address from the oracle members.

setQuorum(uint256).notice: Edits the quorum required to forward beacon data to River

userdoc.notice: This contract handles the input from the allowed oracle members. Highly inspired by Lido's implementation.
